meta.title: About
meta.description: Discover my journey, expertise, and vision for web development
meta.keywords: web development, front-end, technical expertise, Simon TESSARD

paragraphs.first: I am Simon TESSARD, a 24-year-old web developer based in Rennes, who has recently launched his independent business.
paragraphs.second: My goal for each project is to elevate your work and skills through a creation that tells your story and reflects your identity. I achieve this by focusing on meticulous finishing touches, combined with fluid animations.
paragraphs.third: My skills encompass Web Development (Front-end and Back-end) and Web Design, allowing me to create your website from start to finish.
paragraphs.fourth: Available for freelance missions, feel free to contact me to discuss your project or any other inquiries.

list.description: Creating showcase sites and web applications for various clients
+10 Varied web development projects in various fields.
